programme.desc: Horse Riding and Throwing Far. Horse-riding coach Pearl puts novice Olivia through her paces, and coach Sanchia helps rookie Zack throw further than ever before.

programme.title: Teeny Tiny Creatures with Chantelle and Rory
programme.desc: Lizards. Chantelle helps look after lizards while Rory and Sandy make lizard camouflage art.

programme.title: Our Family
programme.desc: King Henry. Henry pretends to be a king and heads on an adventurous quest to rescue a treasured toy!

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Naomi's Senegalese Mafe Fish. Naomi is making a very special Senegalese seafood dish called mafe fish. She serves it with white fluffy rice and a colourful Senegalese drink.

programme.title: Apple Tree House
programme.desc: Night Birds. Sam finds out that Annie is having trouble sleeping because of bad dreams.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Mission: Last Minute Visitor. Disability assistance dog Tinks and her owner Charli have a long list of chores to do, all in time for Annabel, their last minute visitor!

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures
programme.desc: Andy and the Chimpanzees. Andy, Jen and Scout head to the forests of the Ivory Coast in West Africa on a global adventure to find out how chimpanzees break open African walnuts.

programme.title: Yakka Dee!
programme.desc: x. Dee encourages a friend to say 'x', and they go on an adventure around the sound. They meet a Tyrannosaurus rex, a fox with chicken pox and an ox on a box!

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: On My Way to Numberblock Fair. One is on her way to Numberblock Fair, using positional language and a map.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: Fit. Educational fun. H needs a helping hand to heave herself up the hill, so I turns instructor for an incredible workout.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Walking Badge. The Squirrels learn the many ways you can walk with the help of friends and a catchy song.

programme.title: Love Monster
programme.desc: Day after Woo Hoo Day. Love Monster tries to tidy up after a party on the green creates a mess. It's a big job for one person, so he should ask for help, but everyone else is asleep!

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: Cleo Nibbles. A soul singer is coming to perform in the garden, but no one knows what they look like.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Red's Recolouring Tour. Red is on a colour tour with her friends, showing them the sights of where she did her very first colouring.

programme.title: Something Special: We're All Friends
programme.desc: Getting Sporty. Educational series using Makaton sign language. Today, Justin and his friends learn how to boogie board while Mr Tumble plays a game of tennis with Lord Tumble.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Cold. Preschool series. The Teletubbies are outside in the cold when they spot the Tiddlytubbies, who are inside and warm. They put on hats, gloves and scarves to keep warm.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: Tidbit's Stinging Sunburn. Vida soothes Tidbit's sunburn when fun in the sun distracts him from reapplying sunscreen.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Cherry Picker! The town's ferris wheel is stuck, so Mojo and Bo have to get it moving. But they do their job too well, because the wheel rolls away, forcing Mojo and Bo to chase it down.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Evil Pea Takes a Break. Evil Pea's spa break is ruined when the Cobs try to trick Supertato while she's gone.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: Waffle Needs Quiet Time. Waffle learns that reading can be just as much fun as noisy maze games.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Amazing Motorbikes. Grace shows off three amazing machines, all of which are different kinds of motorbikes.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild
programme.desc: Painted Dog and Coati. Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two amazing animals and reveal a surprising connection between them in the wild. This time, it's the painted dog and the coati.

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Planet of the Floating Islands. Where are the children on a mysterious planet with colourful puffs of air?

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: The Problem Plant. Big Lizard steals Dad's special plant from the ship... and just in time!

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Super Squirrel Badge. Animated preschool series. The Squirrels decide they want to be superheroes. Is there anyone that needs their help?

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: The Tale of the Angry Cat. Animated series. Peter accidentally brings home Mr McGregor's cat rather than a cart of freshly-picked brussels sprouts.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures
programme.desc: Ankylosaur and Club. Preschool adventure series. Andy meets the ankylosaur, the armoured tank of the dinosaur world, when he travels 70 million years back in time.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Mount Everest, Asia. Animated adventure comedy series. Kyan wants to climb Mount Everest, but there's a giant snowball heading his way - and it's got a moustache!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Stories. Indy's upset her model horse looks like a cow, but Calypso encourages her not to give up.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Library. When Muffin is told that she is special by her Dad, she uses it as an excuse to do anything she wants, which means playing Bluey and Bingo's library game her way.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Desserts of Destiny. Evil Pea traps Supertato and Tomato in her cake cave. They must avoid her devious traps.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: Sunny's Baby Sister Surprise. When Sunny meets his new baby sister, he's disappointed that she can't play all the games he had planned. But Vida knows just what to do.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Mission: Sleepover. Diesel's super ears investigate a strange noise that interrupts Rayane's sleepover party.

programme.title: Alphablocks & Numberblocks Specials
programme.desc: Making Friends. Two worlds collide as the Alphablocks meet the Numberblocks for the very first time. Will they be friends?

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran

programme.title: Moon and Me
programme.desc: The Upside-Down Princess. Colly Wobble decides to play at being the Upside-Down Princess after finding her crown.

programme.title: Clangers
programme.desc: Chicken in Charge. Animation about a family of small creatures who live on, and inside, a planet. Major, Mother and Granny go on a trip, leaving the Iron Chicken in charge.

programme.title: In the Night Garden

programme.desc: ...Christmas Special: In this special Christmas episode, the teams must create an item featured in the Nine Days of Bricksmas carol to win the title and the trophy.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Irish Pub Formulation: A visit from Raj's sister Priya creates tension among the guys, especially when Leonard asks Sheldon to conceal his romantic past with her.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Boyfriend Complexity: When Penny's father visits, Leonard discovers that her parents still think that he and Penny are a couple, so he takes advantage of the situation.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Putting Down Roots: Dede's husband, Jerry, comes to town to bequeath her possessions to the family. Mitch and Claire receive a little more of Dede than they know what to do with.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: It's the night before Christmas. There's a touching reunion at the McQueens' and Freddie confesses his true feelings. A festive party turns frosty, and a kind deed does more harm than good.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: It's Christmas Day, and the McQueens are happy for Mercedes when they catch Freddie trying to sneak out. Families come together in the village, but a chilling event stops the festivities...

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: The villagers are reeling from a shocking turn of events, and the McQueens are on different paths. Desperation leads to a lie, but with two parents distracted, a call for help goes unheard.

programme.title: The Snowman and the Snowdog
programme.desc: Charming animated sequel to Raymond Briggs' classic The Snowman. When a young boy and his mother move house, he builds a snowman and a snowdog who magically come to life.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Ava: Jeffords asks Peralta to take care of his pregnant wife when she drops by at the precinct while he and Diaz are out seeking information on a murder case.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Swedes: Santiago and Jeffords help Gina to prepare for an exam. Peralta and Diaz work with two Swedish detectives on an international jewel theft case.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Launch Party and a Whole Human Being: The Coopers can't be found as Mandy goes into labour, and Sheldon is excited about the launch of his database.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Teen Angst and a Smart-Boy Walk of Shame: Sheldon confronts the failure of his database, Georgie and Mandy struggle as new parents, and Missy feels forgotten.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Pancake Batter Anomaly: Penny volunteers to nurse Sheldon when he's sick. But his friends, who know how miserable he is when he's ill, stay well away.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Jerusalem Duality: Sheldon's confidence is shaken to the core by a 15-year-old physicist who is clearly much brighter than him.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: (2015) Animated family comedy sequel. Mavis (Selena Gomez) and Johnny (Andy Samberg) leave baby Dennis with 'Vampa' Dracula (Adam Sandler), who organises a monster boot camp.

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube Shorts
programme.desc: Cheeky clips from Rude Tube's naughty little sister Rude(ish) Tube, featuring weddings, space and sci-fi fans.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Apology Insufficiency: Leonard thinks his dating problems are due to a lack of confidence, and vows to be self-assured around attractive women. Howard is called by the FBI.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The 21-Second Excitation: The gang's plans to attend a film screening are scuppered by Sheldon's nemesis Wil Wheaton. Penny and Bernadette invite Amy to her first slumber party.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Cheddar: Santiago and Peralta house-sit for Captain Holt when he visits Kevin in Paris and mayhem ensues when Holt's beloved dog goes missing on their watch.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Terry Kitties: Jeffords enlists Peralta's help to solve a case from his past. Santiago invites herself to a competitive training exercise with Holt and Diaz.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Strangers in the Night: When Alex tells Phil and Claire she has a boyfriend, they worry that they've put too much pressure on her and that she's made up an imaginary boyfriend.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Haley's 21st Birthday: The family take Haley to a bar to celebrate her 21st birthday. Can Claire convince Haley to see her as a friend, rather than as her uptight mum?

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Roulette Wheel and a Piano Playing Dog: Sheldon realises that he's the weakest student in his class, and Meemaw sets out to expand her gambling business.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Strudel and a Hot American Boy Toy: Sheldon explores Germany behind Mary's back, Missy attempts to pull a fast one on George Sr, and Meemaw and Dale adjust.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Skank Reflex Analysis: Penny worries that she's screwed things up with her friends after her night with Raj. Sheldon takes command of the paintball team.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Infestation Hypothesis: Amy is stuck in the middle of a battle of wills between Penny and Sheldon. Leonard and Priya try to spice up their long-distance relationship.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Pulled Groin Extrapolation: Leonard goes to a colleague's wedding as Amy's date. Howard tries to convince Bernadette to live with his mum after they get married.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Wiggly Finger Catalyst: Raj begins to get upset that he's the only one of the four guys not in a relationship, so Penny sets out to find him the perfect date.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: It's New Year's Eve. The Hutchinsons wake to find Ro unconscious, and things don't get any better for the family... Elsewhere, will a nudge help to pull a star-crossed couple back together?

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Stuck in a Moment: Hayley wants to give the family a Christmas gift they'll never forget - if she can find the perfect time. Claire is mad when Phil borrows the Christmas tree.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Love Bites: Engaged couple Christopher and Tess inherited a New York diner, but working together has created a toxic work environment. Can Gordon help?

programme.title: The Inbetweeners Movie
programme.desc: (2011) Comedy with Simon Bird, Joe Thomas, Blake Harrison and James Buckley. School is over, so the boys celebrate with an outrageous lads holiday in Crete.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: First Day: Smash hit comedy about four teenagers. Will (Simon Bird), whose parents have divorced, must move to a new area and change from private to comprehensive school.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Bunk Off: Will, Simon, Jay and Neil bunk off school. They go to Neil's house to get drunk, and Simon has a vodka-induced romantic revelation about his childhood sweetheart Carli.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Thorpe Park: After passing his driving test, Simon takes the boys on their first road trip: a day out at Thorpe Park, where Will disgraces himself on the roller coaster.

programme.title: The Inbetweeners
programme.desc: Will Gets a Girlfriend: Will sees that going to a mixed-sex school isn't so bad when he pulls the most popular girl in the year above. But he alienates his hard-won new friends.

programme.title: American Reunion
programme.desc: (2012) Adult comedy. Jason Biggs, Alyson Hannigan and Seann William Scott star in this American Pie sequel. The class of 1999 gather to reminisce and misbehave.

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Millie has exhausted Cornwall's dating pool and hopes to finally wave goodbye to laid-back surfers. And will window cleaner Alex's date take a shine to his fit body?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Love Bites: Engaged couple Christopher and Tess inherited a New York diner, but working together has created a toxic work environment. Can Gordon help?

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Paranoia: Jeffords disapproves of Diaz's fast-moving relationship with Pimento, who has started to believe that someone from his past is trying to kill him.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Maximum Security: Santiago goes undercover at a women's prison and befriends one of the inmates. Holt and the team plan a fake funeral to catch a hitman.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: The villagers are reeling from a shocking turn of events, and the McQueens are on different paths. Desperation leads to a lie, but with two parents distracted, a call for help goes unheard.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: It's New Year's Eve. The Hutchinsons wake to find Ro unconscious, and things don't get any better for the family... Elsewhere, will a nudge help to pull a star-crossed couple back together?

programme.title: The Art of The Snowman and the...
programme.desc: ...Snowdog: A behind-the-scenes look at how an animator brings the friendly character of The Snowman to life using only a pencil and a light box, in beautiful close-up.

programme.title: The Art of The Snowman and the...
programme.desc: ...Snowdog: This exclusive behind-the-scenes film shows in beautiful close-up exactly how an animator brings the character of Billy to life using only a pencil and a light box.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: In Oakhurst, New Jersey, Gordon Ramsay helps the overwhelmed owner of Mike and Nellie's restaurant, who lost his way when his father and business partner died.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Yippie Kayak: Peralta, Boyle and Gina get into trouble while doing some shopping on Christmas Eve. Santiago tries to prove she's as tough as Holt and Diaz.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Hostage Situation: Boyle and Genevieve want to take their relationship to a new level, but his ex-wife Eleanor disrupts their plans. Can Peralta help them?

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Stolen Truck and Going on the Lam: Missy steals her dad's truck and hits the road with her friend Paige.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A German Folk Song and an Actual Adult: Georgie goes on a birthday date, and Sheldon takes an interest in Missy's favourite TV show.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Bat Jar Conjecture: Sheldon is ousted from the gang's Physics Bowl quiz team, so he decides to prove his superiority by forming his own team for the event.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Nerdvana Annihilation: Penny makes fun of Leonard's habit of collecting goofy memorabilia, but his friends kick up a fuss and try to keep him on the side of the nerds.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3

programme.title: Peter Rabbit

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Alien Parasite Hypothesis: Amy realises that she has romantic feelings for Zack. Raj and Howard compete to prove who would make the better superhero.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Justice League Recombination: The guys slowly warm to Zack and find an enjoyable way to bond with him when they enter a New Year's Eve fancy dress competition together.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Bus Pants Utilization: Leonard and Sheldon fight for control of an idea for an app.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Ants on a Log and a Cheating Winker: Missy steps up, Mary has a surprise for George, and Sheldon finds his dorm occupied.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A Frankenstein's Monster and a Crazy Church Guy: Sheldon helps his roommate on the stock market, Missy and Billy have a party, and Mary finds a new church.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Russian Rocket Reaction: Sheldon's old nemesis Wil Wheaton returns and invites everyone to a housewarming party. But Sheldon threatens to 'de-friend' Leonard if he attends.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Rhinitis Revelation: Sheldon's mother Mary comes to town and soon becomes a firm favourite with his friends, much to Sheldon's annoyance.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Good Guy Fluctuation: Leonard doubts his feelings for Priya when he kisses a woman he meets in the comic book shop. The gang pull pranks on Sheldon to celebrate Halloween.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Isolation Permutation: Amy is heartbroken when she finds out that Penny and Bernadette went on a shopping trip to buy bridesmaids' dresses without her.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: As the Hutchinsons fall apart, Tony has some bad news for Diane. Donny keeps a close eye on Abe. And a lost teen receives an unexpected invitation.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The leading news stories of the moment.

programme.title: Ambulance
programme.desc: (2022) Michael Bay's high-octane thriller with Jake Gyllenhaal. A bodged heist sees two brothers try to evade the LAPD in a hospital wagon, as a paramedic operates on a cop in the back.

programme.title: The Last Stand
programme.desc: (2013) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Johnny Knoxville and Forest Whitaker. A small-town sheriff and his inexperienced staff take on a drug cartel boss who's fleeing to Mexico.

programme.title: Team America: World Police
programme.desc: (2004) Outrageous satirical comedy from the South Park team. A crack team of puppets battle to save the world from an evil terrorist plot hatched by North Korean leader Kim Jong Il.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: BSL Zone: Sign2Win
programme.desc: Sign2Win, BSL Zone's first deaf gameshow. The BSL language and deaf cultural knowledge of three teams are put to the test to see who will win £1k.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Dr Seuss' The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: (2003) Family comedy with Mike Myers. A badly behaved boy and his super-organised sister are plunged into an anarchic adventure when a man-sized talking cat suddenly appears at their home.

programme.title: The War with Grandpa
programme.desc: (2020) Raucous family comedy starring Robert De Niro, Uma Thurman and Oakes Fegley. A grandpa gets embroiled in a prank war with his grandson when he moves into the family home.

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: (2007) Supernatural thriller. Alexander Ludwig stars as The Seeker, who has the task of finding six items hidden throughout time, which the scary forces of The Dark are also looking for.

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: (1984) Comedy action adventure starring Michael Douglas and Kathleen Turner. An adventurer helps a bestselling author to search for her sister, who's been kidnapped in Colombia.

programme.title: We Live in Time Interview Special
programme.desc: Stars Andrew Garfield and Florence Pugh - along with director John Crowley - talk about making the Film4-backed romantic drama We Live in Time.

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: (2006) Comedy-drama starring Anne Hathaway and Meryl Streep. A naive young woman lands a job as assistant to one of New York's most important, but ruthless and cynical, magazine editors.

programme.title: Dog
programme.desc: (2022) Poignant road-trip comedy with Channing Tatum. A soldier with PTSD must escort a traumatised army canine to a comrade's funeral. Can man and dog save each other's lives?

programme.title: The Departed
programme.desc: (2006) Martin Scorsese's crime thriller with Matt Damon, Leonardo DiCaprio and Jack Nicholson. Two infiltrators on opposite sides of the law play a dangerous game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: (2020) Fighty, satirical horror that upset Donald Trump. Hilary Swank plays a rich lefty who likes hunting working class people to the death. But she didn't reckon on Betty Gilpin.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Dunston Checks In
programme.desc: (1996) Comedy starring Faye Dunaway and Rupert Everett. A hotel owner's attempt to upgrade her star rating is undermined by the arrival of a master thief and his light-fingered orangutan.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: (2003) Jack Black cranks the comedy up to 11. A slacker rock musician blags his way into a posh school and enrols a bunch of 10-year-olds into a full-scale Battle of the Bands.

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: (1984) It's time to put on make-up. It's time to light the lights. Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzy, the Blues one and the gang embark on a musical adventure as they try to make it on Broadway.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: (1984) Kung fu thriller with Ralph Macchio and Pat Morita. Elderly handyman Mr Miyagi teaches new-kid-at-school Daniel how to stand up to the school bully. It all hinges on the crane kick.

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: (1999) Teen comedy with Julia Stiles and Heath Ledger. A student is furious to discover her prom date was bribed by her sister to invite her. But confusion ensues when he falls for her.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: (2009) Quentin Tarantino's WWII action-adventure with Brad Pitt. A squad of Jewish American soldiers go Nazi-hunting in occupied France. With Christoph Waltz and Michael Fassbender.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: (2019) Quentin Tarantino's darkly comic drama set in 60s LA, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Brad Pitt and Margot Robbie. A failing actor's world collides with the Manson Family.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Daleks Invasion Earth 2150 A.D.
programme.desc: (1966) A sci-fi classic with Peter Cushing. Dr Who travels to the future only to find the Daleks have conquered the Earth! Can he stop them nuking the planet's core? With Bernard Cribbins.

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: (1983) Comedy starring Peter Riegert, Burt Lancaster and Peter Capaldi. A US oil company executive tries to persuade a small Scottish seaside community to sell up their entire village.

programme.title: The Greatest Showman
programme.desc: (2017) Hugh Jackman, Zac Efron and Michelle Williams star in the Golden-Globe-winning, toe-tapping smash hit musical about the life and times of P.T. Barnum, the creator of the circus.

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: (1995) Classic 90s high-school re-imagining of Jane Austen's Emma. Two fashion-obsessed pals (Alicia Silverstone, Stacey Dash) transform a new girl (Brittany Murphy) but create a monster.

programme.title: Cowboys & Aliens
programme.desc: (2011) Sci-fi western starring Daniel Craig and Harrison Ford. A brutal cattle baron and his amnesiac enemy must cease their feuding when a town is attacked by aliens.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost...
programme.desc: ...Protocol: (2011) Part four of the Tom Cruise action-thriller franchise. The Impossible Missions Force fight to clear their name, while also trying to avert nuclear war. Busy, busy, busy!

programme.title: Everybody's Talking About Jamie
programme.desc: (2021) Feelgood coming-of-age musical with Max Harwood, Sarah Lancashire and Richard E Grant. A young lad dreams of escaping his humdrum existence and becoming a fabulous drag queen.

programme.title: Ambulance
programme.desc: (2022) Michael Bay's high-octane thriller with Jake Gyllenhaal. A bodged heist sees two brothers try to evade the LAPD in a hospital wagon, as a paramedic operates on a cop in the back.

programme.desc: (2013) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Johnny Knoxville and Forest Whitaker. A small-town sheriff and his inexperienced staff take on a drug cartel boss who's fleeing to Mexico.

programme.title: Team America: World Police
programme.desc: (2004) Outrageous satirical comedy from the South Park team. A crack team of puppets battle to save the world from an evil terrorist plot hatched by North Korean leader Kim Jong Il.

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: (1983) Comedy starring Peter Riegert, Burt Lancaster and Peter Capaldi. A US oil company executive tries to persuade a small Scottish seaside community to sell up their entire village.

programme.title: The Greatest Showman
programme.desc: (2017) Hugh Jackman, Zac Efron and Michelle Williams star in the Golden-Globe-winning, toe-tapping smash hit musical about the life and times of P.T. Barnum, the creator of the circus.

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: (1995) Classic 90s high-school re-imagining of Jane Austen's Emma. Two fashion-obsessed pals (Alicia Silverstone, Stacey Dash) transform a new girl (Brittany Murphy) but create a monster.

programme.title: Cowboys & Aliens
programme.desc: (2011) Sci-fi western starring Daniel Craig and Harrison Ford. A brutal cattle baron and his amnesiac enemy must cease their feuding when a town is attacked by aliens.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost...
programme.desc: ...Protocol: (2011) Part four of the Tom Cruise action-thriller franchise. The Impossible Missions Force fight to clear their name, while also trying to avert nuclear war. Busy, busy, busy!

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Jessica and Adrian Rashleigh hope that the beautiful Cornish coastal surroundings will make up for the snugness of the three-bedroom Chy Conyn in St Ives. Will their guests agree?

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Romesh Ranganathan's Parents' Evening
programme.desc: Comedy game show in which celebrities team up with family members, with the parents choosing which questions their grown-up children will answer and gambling on how many they can get right. Alison Hammond's son Aidan comes close to damaging the family brand, and Carol Vorderman makes life difficult for her son Cameron. Romesh's mum Shanthi has her head turned by the sight of Iain Stirling in long johns, with the Love Island narrator being in a team with his mother

programme.title: English Football League Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the latest matches, including Derby County v Leeds United at Pride Park, Stoke City v Sunderland at Bet365 Stadium and Sheffield United v West Bromwich Albion at Bramall Lane in the Championship

programme.title: Dermot O'Leary's Taste of Ireland
programme.desc: The broadcaster travels to Northern Ireland to explore the culinary scene in Belfast, a city blessed with a bounty of food and drink. Dermot also meets chef and restaurateur Gemma Austin and finds out about Fifteens, an iconic snack in the city

programme.desc: Morning magazine featuring a lively mix of news and current affairs, plus health, entertainment and lifestyle features

programme.title: Lorraine
programme.desc: Early morning chat show presented by Lorraine Kelly, with celebrity interviews, entertainment news, cooking tips, fashion features and musical guests.

programme.title: This Morning
programme.desc: A mix of celebrity chat, lifestyle features, advice and competitions

programme.title: Loose Women
programme.desc: Celebrity interviews and studio discussion from a female perspective

programme.desc: The key headlines from the day so far

programme.title: STV News and Weather
programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: The Goonies
programme.desc: Adventure based on a story by Steven Spielberg, starring Sean Astin, Corey Feldman and Martha Plimpton. While clearing out an attic, a gang of boys known as the "Goonies" come across a map revealing the location of a long-lost galleon. But when they begin their search for the vessel, they find the evil Mama Fratelli standing in the way of a fantastic adventure.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune Christmas Special
programme.desc: Graham Norton hosts a special festive edition of the classic game show, with actor Richard E Grant, Gavin & Stacey star Joanna Page and TV and radio presenter Tyler West spinning the wheel and trying to solve puzzles and avoid bankruptcy in the hope of winning £50,000 for the charities of their choice

programme.title: Tipping Point: Best Ever Finals
programme.desc: Compilation of some of the most dramatic endgames from the arcade-themed quiz show hosted by Ben Shephard, in which the last contestant standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts as heptathlete Katarina Johnson-Thompson goes up against the infamous banker - supported by her friends, family and fellow athletes. Can Katarina choose the right boxes and resist the banker's tempting cash offers until just the right moment in order to take home a fortune for her chosen charity?

programme.title: STV News at Six and Weather
programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: A round-up of the day's news headlines and talking points from the UK and around the world

programme.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as Ortis Deley, Maggie Aderin-Pocock, Graeme Hall and Sarah Millican pit their wits against one of the ruthless Chasers in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They must work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Marlon struggles, Jacob arranges a date with Sarah, and Anthony watches a conversation unfold

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: David aims to settle a score with Kit, Toyah implores Nick to keep Leanne out of prison, and Max tries to remain positive about Lauren's trial. Meanwhile, Carla invites Lisa and Betsy to stay, and Ken responds to Cassie's financial admission

programme.title: Archie
programme.desc: Cary's relationship with Dyan Cannon finally blossoms and he takes her to visit his childhood home in Bristol, and she feels like she finally knows the real man while on the trip and moves in with him back in Los Angeles. However, she soon discovers that not everything is perfect with the golden man of Hollywood as Cary has a controlling nature and seems to find fault with tiny details that include Dyan's dress sense and her partying.

programme.title: Archie
programme.desc: Cary overcomes his fears and phobias and ties the knot for a fourth time with Dyan Cannon and they are soon thrilled with the arrival of his first child Jennifer in 1966. But at 62, Cary struggles with the responsibilities of being a parent after an all-too-short honeymoon period and becomes controlling again

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: My National Gallery
programme.desc: The stories of people whose lives have been touched by the art museum in Trafalgar Square, from security guards to directors, and everyday visitors to celebrities and members of the royal family. Claudia Winkleman, Michael Palin, Terry Gilliam, Jacqueline Wilson and Princess Eugenie are among those revealing personal connections with the National Gallery, with each contributor identifying the one artwork that means the most to them, with this diverse cross-section of society making surprising choices of both well-known masterpieces and hidden gems

programme.title: Archie
programme.desc: A lonely and troubled Cary Grant deals with the fallout from his third divorce, flashing back to his traumatic childhood as Archibald Leach in Bristol, with a bullying father and a mother grieving for the loss of his older brother. When Archie's father tells him that his mother has died, Archie finds a new family with a group of circus performers. Drama, starring Jason Isaacs

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Musical based on the hit stage show, starring John Travolta and Olivia Newton-John. Unexpectedly reunited with summer love Danny at her new high school, Sandy Olsson can't believe how different he is. Can the new Danny Zuko, the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-birds, really be the boy she met down at the beach? Perhaps Frenchy and Rizzo, both members of the super-cool Pink Ladies gang, can help her develop some street cred to win back his heart.

programme.title: Tipping Point: Best Ever Finals
programme.desc: Compilation of some of the most dramatic endgames from the arcade-themed quiz show hosted by Ben Shephard, in which the last contestant standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as Christine Ohuruogu, Max George, Maisie Smith and Owain Wyn-Evans pit their wits against one of the ruthless Chasers in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They must work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught

programme.title: STV News and Weather
programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: A round-up of the day's news headlines and talking points from the UK and around the world

programme.title: The National Lottery's New Year's Eve Big Bash
programme.desc: Fleur East and Vernon Kay host a concert to celebrate the end of 2024 at Wembley Arena, with performances from Craig David presents TS5, Olly Alexander, House Gospel Choir and Cirque du Soleil's Corteo. Plus, Richard Armitage and Roman Kemp look back at all the big film, TV and entertainment stories of the year

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Marlon has a terrible start to his new year, Anthony learns a secret, and five flashforwards tease things to come - but what do they mean?

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: As the year draws to a close, Audrey encourages David to put his family first, Roy advises Evelyn to take the law into her own hands, and Carla makes a midnight declaration to Lisa

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: Spy adventure starring Daniel Craig and Christoph Waltz. After foiling a terrorist attack in Mexico City, James Bond picks up the trail of a secret organisation known as Spectre. He infiltrates one of their meetings in Rome, only to discover that his every move has been monitored by Spectre's mysterious leader, a man known as Franz Oberhauser.

programme.title: Bringing in the Bells
programme.desc: Lorraine Kelly is joined by Susie McCabe, Grado, Jean Johansson, Gordon Smart, Sean Batty and Laura Boyd to reflect on 2024 as they ring in the new year and look forward to 2025

programme.title: TikTok: Top 100 2024
programme.desc: A countdown of the top 100 funniest, most extreme and rudest viral videos of 2024 from TikTok and other social media platforms. Plus, an estimation of how much money the clips made for their creators

programme.title: You Bet!
programme.desc: Holly Willoughby and Stephen Mulhern host the second of two editions of a reboot of the game show, which sees contestants face extraordinary challenges for the chance to win £10,000. A panel of celebrities, led by Rob Beckett and featuring Olly Murs, Mary Earps and Judi Love, and the studio audience must predict if each challenger can complete the task with which they are faced

programme.title: Archie
programme.desc: As a young man in his twenties, Archie Leach is struggling to make his way in New York when a chance encounter with comedian George Burns leads him to audition for a play. After receiving rave reviews for his performance, he travels to Hollywood, where his good looks quickly get him attention. He signs a deal with Paramount Studios, is given the new name Cary Grant and is spotted by screen icon Mae West. Drama, starring Jason Isaacs

programme.title: Unwind with STV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: In for a Penny
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern takes the show across the pond for a special long episode from Walt Disney World Resort in Florida with classic games and brand-new ones too.

programme.title: Pictionary
programme.desc: Mel Giedroyc hosts the game show where two teams of three players compete against each other trying to guess the correct word or phrase represented by the drawings of their team-mates. Mel is joined by Jeff Brazier and Scarlett Moffatt as the players draw and their team members guess

programme.title: The Chase: The Bloopers 2024
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents a compilation of mistakes, outtakes and laughs from the quiz show, featuring regular Chasers Shaun Wallace, Mark Labbett, Jenny Ryan, Anne Hegerty, Paul Sinha and Darragh Ennis

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: Musical fantasy starring Dick Van Dyke. An inventor restores a clapped-out racing car with the help of his eccentric father and two children. They christen it Chitty Chitty Bang Bang and, much to their surprise, the vehicle turns out to have magical powers.

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: Animated comedy adventure featuring the voices of Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig and Trey Parker. Having already acquired a wife and three orphan daughters, reformed supervillain Gru now discovers that he has a long-lost twin, Dru. But Dru is hoping he can convince his brother to return to his wicked ways...

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: The key headlines from the day so far

programme.title: STV Racing: Live from Cheltenham
programme.desc: Ed Chamberlin presents coverage of a meeting headlined by the Relkeel Hurdle from Cheltenham, plus action from Musselburgh. With analysis from AP McCoy and Mick Fitzgerald, and commentary by Richard Hoiles

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Decades on from the creation of Jurassic Park, a fully operational attraction filled with genetically engineered dinosaurs has been opened on the island. In need of a new attraction, the company behind the park creates an entirely new species - only for it to escape and terrorise the tourists. Action adventure sequel, starring Chris Pratt and Bryce Dallas Howard

programme.desc: More of the most dramatic endgames from the arcade-themed quiz show hosted by Ben Shephard, as plucky players and famous faces alike take on the machine for its £10,000 jackpot

programme.desc: Cain and Moira book a quiet lunch, Jacob apologises to Sarah, and it is the anniversary of Heath's death as Bob breaks down

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Roy makes a timely decision to check on an unwell Carla, Sarah spots an emotional exchange between Daniel and Daisy, and Evelyn applies to university. Cassie delights in winding up Tracy, Lisa confronts Matty over Becky's death, and Dylan calls a truce with Mason

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: As she considers a life-changing decision, Vera finds herself investigating two cases when an ex-prisoner's body is discovered on the banks of the River Tyne and she has to find out if the former inmate has been served cold justice or if there's more to his death

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore and Whoopi Goldberg. Soon after swearing his undying love to girlfriend Molly Jensen, investment banker Sam Wheat is killed by a mugger. Sam's troubled spirit refuses to leave Molly and he becomes her ghostly guardian, but how can he warn her that her life is in danger?

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Romesh Ranganathan's Parents' Evening
programme.desc: Comedy game show in which celebrities team up with family members, with the parents choosing which questions their grown-up children will answer and gambling on how many they can get right. Alison Hammond's son Aidan comes close to damaging the family brand, and Carol Vorderman makes life difficult for her son Cameron. Romesh's mum Shanthi has her head turned by the sight of Iain Stirling in long johns, with the Love Island narrator being in a team with his mother

programme.title: English Football League Highlights
programme.desc: Action from the latest matches, including Derby County v Leeds United at Pride Park, Stoke City v Sunderland at Bet365 Stadium and Sheffield United v West Bromwich Albion at Bramall Lane in the Championship

programme.desc: The broadcaster travels to Northern Ireland to explore the culinary scene in Belfast, a city blessed with a bounty of food and drink. Dermot also meets chef and restaurateur Gemma Austin and finds out about Fifteens, an iconic snack in the city

programme.title: ITV Evening News

programme.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as Ortis Deley, Maggie Aderin-Pocock, Graeme Hall and Sarah Millican pit their wits against one of the ruthless Chasers in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They must work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Marlon struggles, Jacob arranges a date with Sarah, and Anthony watches a conversation unfold

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: David aims to settle a score with Kit, Toyah implores Nick to keep Leanne out of prison, and Max tries to remain positive about Lauren's trial. Meanwhile, Carla invites Lisa and Betsy to stay, and Ken responds to Cassie's financial admission

programme.title: Archie
programme.desc: Cary's relationship with Dyan Cannon finally blossoms and he takes her to visit his childhood home in Bristol, and she feels like she finally knows the real man while on the trip and moves in with him back in Los Angeles. However, she soon discovers that not everything is perfect with the golden man of Hollywood as Cary has a controlling nature and seems to find fault with tiny details that include Dyan's dress sense and her partying.

programme.title: Archie
programme.desc: Cary overcomes his fears and phobias and ties the knot for a fourth time with Dyan Cannon and they are soon thrilled with the arrival of his first child Jennifer in 1966. But at 62, Cary struggles with the responsibilities of being a parent after an all-too-short honeymoon period and becomes controlling again

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: My National Gallery
programme.desc: The stories of people whose lives have been touched by the art museum in Trafalgar Square, from security guards to directors, and everyday visitors to celebrities and members of the royal family. Claudia Winkleman, Michael Palin, Terry Gilliam, Jacqueline Wilson and Princess Eugenie are among those revealing personal connections with the National Gallery, with each contributor identifying the one artwork that means the most to them, with this diverse cross-section of society making surprising choices of both well-known masterpieces and hidden gems

programme.title: Archie
programme.desc: A lonely and troubled Cary Grant deals with the fallout from his third divorce, flashing back to his traumatic childhood as Archibald Leach in Bristol, with a bullying father and a mother grieving for the loss of his older brother. When Archie's father tells him that his mother has died, Archie finds a new family with a group of circus performers. Drama, starring Jason Isaacs

programme.title: The National Lottery's New Year's Eve Big Bash

Plus, Richard Armitage and Roman Kemp look back at all the big film, TV and entertainment stories of the year

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Marlon has a terrible start to his new year, Anthony learns a secret, and five flashforwards tease things to come - but what do they mean?

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: As the year draws to a close, Audrey encourages David to put his family first, Roy advises Evelyn to take the law into her own hands, and Carla makes a midnight declaration to Lisa

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: Spy adventure starring Daniel Craig and Christoph Waltz. After foiling a terrorist attack in Mexico City, James Bond picks up the trail of a secret organisation known as Spectre. He infiltrates one of their meetings in Rome, only to discover that his every move has been monitored by Spectre's mysterious leader, a man known as Franz Oberhauser.

programme.title: Bringing in the Bells
programme.desc: Lorraine Kelly is joined by Susie McCabe, Grado, Jean Johansson, Gordon Smart, Sean Batty and Laura Boyd to reflect on 2024 as they ring in the new year and look forward to 2025

programme.title: TikTok: Top 100 2024
programme.desc: A countdown of the top 100 funniest, most extreme and rudest viral videos of 2024 from TikTok and other social media platforms. Plus, an estimation of how much money the clips made for their creators

programme.title: You Bet!
programme.desc: Holly Willoughby and Stephen Mulhern host the second of two editions of a reboot of the game show, which sees contestants face extraordinary challenges for the chance to win £10,000. A panel of celebrities, led by Rob Beckett and featuring Olly Murs, Mary Earps and Judi Love, and the studio audience must predict if each challenger can complete the task with which they are faced

programme.title: Archie
programme.desc: As a young man in his twenties, Archie Leach is struggling to make his way in New York when a chance encounter with comedian George Burns leads him to audition for a play. After receiving rave reviews for his performance, he travels to Hollywood, where his good looks quickly get him attention. He signs a deal with Paramount Studios, is given the new name Cary Grant and is spotted by screen icon Mae West. Drama, starring Jason Isaacs
